keyMoments.title: Kurosai FR-U IV Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky debuts the Kurosai FR-U IV, a giant black three-wheeled motorcycle with an armored rhino head from the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock System Channel 4.
keyMoments.significance: First showcase of Franky's engineering work during the timeskip, revealing one of the Sunny's secret weapons.
keyMoments.quote: Feast your eyes on this! The Kurosai FR-U IV!

abilities.description: A giant black motorcycle with three wheels and an armored rhino head, capable of barreling through multiple enemies.

reveals.information: Created the Kurosai FR-U IV vehicle for the Thousand Sunny

keyMoments.title: Party Music Debut
keyMoments.description: Brook debuts Party Music, a hypnotic musical technique that causes enemies to hallucinate and see an amusement park, making them dance uncontrollably.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Brook's growth as the Soul King, combining his musical talent with combat effectiveness.

keyMoments.title: Quinte Tierce Fantasia Debut
keyMoments.description: Brook uses a swift draw-and-sheathing sword technique to cut down enemies while they are hypnotized by his Party Music.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Brook's enhanced swordsmanship combining music and blade work.

abilities.description: A hypnotic musical technique that causes enemies to hallucinate and see an amusement park, making them dance.
A swift draw-and-sheathing sword technique used in combination with Party Music to cut hypnotized opponents.

reveals.information: Learned to use music as a hypnotic weapon during his time as the Soul King
Developed new sword techniques that work in combination with his music

keyMoments.title: Mil Fleurs, Gigantesco Mano Debut
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to sprout two massive legs made of hands from the ground and stomps on multiple enemies.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's enhanced mastery of her Devil Fruit, now able to create giant-sized limbs after timeskip training.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts two massive legs made of hands from the ground to stomp on enemies.

reveals.information: Can now create giant-sized limbs using her Hana Hana no Mi powers

keyMoments.title: Brachio Tank V Debut
keyMoments.description: Usopp pilots the Brachio Tank V alongside Chopper and Nami, using it to take down many large fish-men soldiers.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the Thousand Sunny's second secret weapon from Soldier Dock System Channel 5.
keyMoments.quote: Here comes the Brachio Tank V!

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Brachio Tank V Debut
keyMoments.description: Chopper co-pilots the Brachio Tank V with Usopp and Nami, helping to operate the tank against enemy forces.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's tactical coordination using the Sunny's new weapons.

keyMoments.title: Brachio Tank V Debut
keyMoments.description: Nami joins Usopp and Chopper in piloting the Brachio Tank V into battle against the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's participation in operating the Sunny's new combat vehicles.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Tames Surume Again
keyMoments.description: Luffy tames Surume the kraken, turning Hody's trump card against him and ordering the kraken to protect Princess Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's ability to earn loyalty through kindness, contrasting with Hody's methods of control through threats.
keyMoments.quote: Surume! Stay near Shirahoshi and protect her!

relationships.description: Luffy earned Surume's loyalty by promising to protect the kraken's brothers at the North Pole.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy re-tames Surume and commands him to protect Shirahoshi.

keyMoments.title: Deployed by Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones deploys Surume as his trump card, ordering the kraken to attack the Straw Hats despite the kraken's previous friendship with Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Hody controls Surume through threats against the kraken's brothers.

keyMoments.title: Surume Betrays Hody
keyMoments.description: Surume chooses to obey Luffy instead of Hody, trusting in Luffy's promise to protect his brothers and accepting the mission to guard Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Surume's trust in Luffy and rejection of Hody's coercive control.

relationships.description: Surume trusts Luffy to protect his brothers at the North Pole and obeys his commands.

evolutionMoments.description: Surume betrays Hody and follows Luffy's orders to protect Shirahoshi.

reveals.information: Chooses to trust Luffy over Hody Jones despite threats to his brothers
